Uses of Interface
sorcer.util.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    sorcer.util  

    • Uses of Command in sorcer.util

      Classes in sorcer.util that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CmdManager
      CmdManager handles command execution, that might be delegated by default back to its invoker, or executed by application specific commands.
      class  EmailCmd
      EmailCmd is a psedofactory for all email commands.
